inputs.remark: V3 和 V4 应该合并。

logic_summary: Merged V3 and V4 into a single visit entry (V3) because the text states the hearing aid fitting occurred on the same day as the vestibular evaluation.

value.collective_interpretation: Vestibular assessment was largely inconclusive as the patient became nauseous and anxious, aborting the vHIT. Self-report indicated severe handicap from dizziness. Pre-fitting evaluation showed normalization of loudness tolerance levels following desensitization exercises, allowing for successful hearing aid fitting.

tests.name: vHIT
tests.result_summary: Aborted because patient became quickly nauseous.

tests.name: Loudness Discomfort Levels (LDL)
tests.result_summary: Normalized to 90-110 dB HL (tones) and 100-105 dB HL (speech).

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Confirmed mild sloping to moderate high-frequency SNHL.
